full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS DGE LEGS KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DZA SAG THU HAN AAS MAG RGYAL KHANG RTZI'I DGON PA RAB BRTAN PHUN TSOGS GLING GI MCHOG SPRUL AER RTE NI BAndI TA HO THOG THU RTA MGRIN BADZRA GYI ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS 'DI LTA BU @003B ZHIG DGOS ZHES, AER TE NI PHYAG MDZAD PA NO YON, HAN AA K'O LA'I CHI K'O LA KANG NI T'A WANG 'OD ZER BADZRA, RGYAL KHANG RTZE HO THOG THU'I PHYAG MDZOD PA GRAGS PA RDO RJE, GSOL DPON DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN, WANG GI KHAMS TSAN GYI BLA MA, DGE BSKOS DGE 'PHEL SOGS, THU SA LA HO THU SHE MEL SNA TSOGS RTEN 'BREL, ME'I RING DZANG GI THUS THAS SOGS SER SKYA THUN MONG NAS MAndAL SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN DANG BCAS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA'I NGOR KHU RAL MKHAN PO NO MON HAN SHING THUNG AER TE NI AU HAN PAndI TA DGON SAR SKYE MING 'DZIN PA BKA' CHEN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN CHOS 'PHEL LA MA MING GZHAN BYANG CHUB DON YOD RGYAL MTSAN GYIS RAB GUS DVANG BA CHEN POS SBYAR BA'O, ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
author_simple: BYANG CHUB DON YOD RGYAL MTSAN,
